methods.description: This operation provides the master data for german railway stations.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the first hit returned in the QueryResult object with respect to all hits returned by the query. If this parameter is omitted, it will be set to 0 internally.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of hits to be returned by that query. If 'limit' is set greater than 10000, it will be reset to 10000 internally and only 10000 hits will be returned.

parameters.name: searchstring
parameters.description: String to search for a station name. The wildcards * (indicating an arbitrary number of characters) and ? (indicating one single character) can be used in the search pattern. A comma separated list of station names is also supported (e.g. searchstring=hamburg*,berlin*).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by station category. Category ranges are supported as well as lists of categories (e.g. category=2-4 or category=1,3-5). The category must be between 1 and 7 otherwise a parameter exception is returned.

parameters.name: federalstate
parameters.description: Filter by German federal state. Lists of federal states are also supported (e.g. federalstate=bayern,hamburg). Wildcards are not allowed here.

parameters.name: eva
parameters.description: Filter by EVA number. Wildcards are not allowed here.

parameters.name: ril
parameters.description: Filter by Ril100-identifier. Wildcards are not allowed here.

parameters.name: logicaloperator
parameters.description: Logical operator to combine query parameters (default=AND). See above for further details.  Allowed values: or, and

methods.description: This operation provides the master data for a german railway station selected by its station-id.
This operation provides the master data for 3-S-Zentralen.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the first hit returned in the QueryResult object with respect to all hits returned by the query. If this parameter is omitted, it will be set to 0 internally.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of hits to be returned by that query. If 'limit' is set greater than 10000, it will be reset to 10000 internally and only 100 hits will be returned.

methods.description: This operation provides the master data for 3-S-Zentralen select by its id.

apiDescription: An API providing master data for German railway stations by DB Station&Service AG.
